text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Allahakarita satyavara atala rahuna n'yayacya bajune saksi vha, ani ekhadya jamatici satruta tumhala n'yaya na karanyavara pravrtta na karavi. N'yaya kara, te allahace bhaya rakhanyasi phara javalace ahe, ani allahace bhaya rakha. Nihsansaya, allaha tumacya pratyeka karmala cangalya prakare januna ahe
